subtasks.name: Understand Regulation Requirements
subtasks.description: Review the RAISE Act to identify specific compliance requirements for the organization.
subtasks.notes: Ensure all team members are briefed on the key aspects of the regulation.

subtasks.name: Develop AI Model Training Protocols
subtasks.description: Create protocols for training AI models that comply with transparency and safety requirements.
subtasks.notes: Involve data scientists to ensure technical feasibility.

subtasks.name: Employee Rights and Obligations Training
subtasks.description: Train employees on their rights and obligations under the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: Ensure training materials are clear and accessible.

subtasks.name: Implement Compliance Monitoring System
subtasks.description: Establish a system to monitor compliance with the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: Consider using third-party tools for effective monitoring.

subtasks.name: Documentation and Reporting
subtasks.description: Document compliance efforts and prepare reports as required by the regulation.
subtasks.notes: Ensure documentation is thorough for potential audits.

key_risks: Non-compliance could lead to legal penalties.
Inadequate training may result in employee misunderstandings of their rights.

subtasks.name: Review Regulation Text
subtasks.description: Thoroughly read and understand the RAISE Act to identify compliance requirements.
subtasks.notes: Legal team should be involved for interpretation.

subtasks.name: Develop Compliance Framework
subtasks.description: Create a framework outlining how the platform will comply with the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: Collaboration with legal and technical teams is crucial.

subtasks.name: Implement Transparency Requirements
subtasks.description: Establish processes to ensure transparency in AI model training and usage.
subtasks.notes: May require technical audits and adjustments to existing systems.

subtasks.name: Employee Training Programs
subtasks.description: Develop and implement training programs for employees on AI compliance and ethics.
subtasks.notes: Training materials should be regularly updated.

subtasks.name: Monitoring and Reporting Mechanisms
subtasks.description: Set up systems to monitor compliance and report violations as per the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: Involves creating dashboards and reporting tools.

subtasks.name: Conduct Regular Compliance Audits
subtasks.description: Schedule and perform audits to ensure ongoing compliance with the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: Third-party auditors may be needed for objectivity.

key_risks: Failure to comply with transparency requirements could lead to legal penalties.
Inadequate training may result in misuse of AI technologies.
